item.title: Aspose.Imaging for JAVA 24.2 - Release notes
item.description: Competitive features: Support of kernel filter Key Summary Category IMAGINGJAVA-8656 Support of kernel filter Feature IMAGINGJAVA-8661 Error converting the EPS image to PDF Enhancement IMAGINGJAVA-8660 Eps to Jpg export issue Enhancement IMAGINGJAVA-8659 Cannot open the EPS image Enhancement IMAGINGJAVA-8645 Optimization memory usage when rendering vector formats. Using step-by-step load/render each record Enhancement IMAGINGJAVA-8640 MSO file is recognized as SVG image Enhancement IMAGINGJAVA-8639 VSIX file recognized as svg Enhancement Public API changes: Added APIs: Please see corresponding cumulative API changes for Aspose.
